verses.roman:
'tumi more kanyā dite karyācha aṅgīkāra
ebe kichu nāhi kaha, ki tomāra vicāra'

synonyms: tumi—you; more—to me; kanyā—your daughter; dite—to give in charity; karyācha—have made; aṅgīkāra—a promise; ebe—now; kichu—something; nāhi—not; kaha—you say; ki—what; tomāra—your; vicāra—conclusion.
translation: "You have promised to give your daughter in charity to me. Now you do not say anything. What is your conclusion?"
